body: The title says it all, Please answer!
body_tagged: The title says it all, Please answer!
title: Are Staff Applications open?

replies.body:
Staff Applications aren't open yet, sorry. They were last open on January 2015 and are expected to re-open around March. It's all dependant on our need of staff.

Sorry for the inconvenience.
replies.body_tagged:
Staff Applications aren't open yet, sorry. They were last open on January 2015 and are expected to re-open around March. It's all dependant on our need of staff.

Sorry for the inconvenience.

replies.body: No the staff applications are not open. They should open I believe in march where the hand pick staff will come in. Don't quote me 100% on this tho except that the apps are closed :)
replies.body_tagged: No the staff applications are not open. They should open I believe in march where the hand pick staff will come in. Don't quote me 100% on this tho except that the apps are closed :)

replies.body: Yep, like the others said I think they are hand-picking staff now starting in March. If that doesn't work, staff apps will start again.
replies.body_tagged: Yep, like the others said I think they are hand-picking staff now starting in March. If that doesn't work, staff apps will start again.

replies.body: Thanks a heap guys! PokerFace I will Poke-Yur-Face :P
